item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there! This is Solaiman Hridoy, a final year Computer Science and Engineering student currently enrolled at USTC with an interest in Programming, Problem Solving, Software Developing, and Data Science.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I can’t explain with just in one blog how much fun it was to begin my personal website!
